title: Sobekkare's Revenge
description: An ancient treasure is unearthed from an Egyptian cave, and one of the artefacts carries a terrible curse, a fatal illness that attacks horses. When Jumana discovers her familyâ€™s prized horses are missing, she follows their tracks into the desert, only to find them with a strange girl. Together, can they stop the curse before all the world's hoprses are afflicted?
author: Angela Dorsey
